item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially
for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
116 Crown
New Haven, CT 06511

Owner/Manager-John


Come join the NHC at New Haven's hip and trendy bar/restaurant 116 Crown.
They are normally closed on Mondays, however; with a promise of a minimum of
40 attendees, they will open just for us. Yay for NHC!!!

And to make this night even more special, NHC Member Melissa Weiner has
started a non-profit, Brighter World Books, to bring books to kids in
schools in South Africa, one school at a time.
Please bring a book (or more) or donations! Everything helps!

P.S. Your donation is tax deductable and you will be given a receipt if you
want one.

Specialty Cocktails:
Church Key - 10 (reg. price $12)
Thom Collins & Elderflower Collins - 7 (reg. price $9)
Cachaca Mojito - 7 (reg. price $8)
Moscow Mule - 6 (reg. price $7)

PLUS a selection of cocktail party food.

Contact is Melissa: 203.232.9626

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Crown 116 - Open just for NHC and Friends!
